channel.title: Java 6 Update 2
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i15.tinypic.com/5zcmqfb.png[/img]
I'm pretty tired of everyone saying i cant get java!! why wont webclient work!
so i'll just teach you how to get latest java :)
First go to this website [url=http://java.com/en/]http://java.com/en/[/url] ---- Now it takes you to the official website of java right when you get there it'll say FREE JAVA DOWNLOAD click that. ---- Now just wait a while now it should take you to a other link of Java It'll say VERIFY INSTALLATION click that. ---- It'll load saying DETECTING IF YOU HAVE LATEST JAVA and it'll be loading just wait.
if it says this: Verified Java Version
Congratulations!
You have the recommended Java installed (Version 6 Update 2). ---- Then don't even bother downloading java. ---- If it says you don't have the recommended java or just not the newest java then see this for the right operating system link.
[url=http://java.com/en/download/manual.jsp]http://java.com/en/download/manual.jsp[/url]
Now pick the system you have if you have Linux click the one that says Linux If you have Windows XP 2000 then click that one etc. ---- Now If you clicked your operating system it'll open up saying this [IMG]http://i4.tinypic.com/4pd0spk.png[/img] Click Save ---- After that it'll start saving. ---- When it's done saving you now have the latest java! [IMG]http://i3.tinypic.com/681hgrt.png[/img]I hope you liked my guide :)

item.title: Java 6 Update 2
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

Not to mention, this guide is wrong, look here:

[quote=“Runescape.com, post:1, topic:139059”][IMG]http://i4.tinypic.com/4pd0spk.png[/ img]
Click Save

After that it’ll start saving.

When it’s done saving you now have the latest java![/quote]

When it’s done saving, you will not have the latest Java until you run the installer and install it.

Read full topic

item.title: Java 6 Update 2
item.dc:creator: @Runescape.com Runescape.com
item.description:
@Runescape.com wrote:

I’m pretty tired of everyone saying i cant get java!! why wont webclient work!

so i’ll just teach you how to get latest java

First go to this website http://java.com/en/

Now it takes you to the official website of java right when you get there it’ll say FREE JAVA DOWNLOAD click that.

Now just wait a while now it should take you to a other link of Java It’ll say VERIFY INSTALLATION click that.

It’ll load saying DETECTING IF YOU HAVE LATEST JAVA and it’ll be loading just wait.

if it says this:
Verified Java Version

Congratulations!

You have the recommended Java installed (Version 6 Update 2).

Then don’t even bother downloading java.

If it says you don’t have the recommended java or just not the newest java then see this for the right operating system link.

http://java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

Now pick the system you have if you have Linux click the one that says Linux If you have Windows XP 2000 then click that one etc.

Now If you clicked your operating system it’ll open up saying
this

Click Save

After that it’ll start saving.

When it’s done saving you now have the latest java!
I hope you liked my guide

Read full topic
